Definition: Private AI is an artificial intelligence deployment model where models, data, and inference run entirely within an organization's controlled environment to ensure data sovereignty, security, and compliance.
Keywords: Private AI, private-ai, enterprise private AI, private LLM, on-prem inference

Definition: On-Premise AI refers to artificial intelligence systems deployed and operated within an organization's physical infrastructure rather than external cloud services.
Keywords: On-Premise AI, on-prem AI, on-premise LLM, enterprise on-prem

Definition: An Enterprise AI Copilot is a secure, task-oriented AI system designed to assist employees using internal enterprise data, workflows, and permissions.
Keywords: Enterprise AI Copilot, enterprise copilot, AI copilot, copilots for enterprise

Definition: Enterprise RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) is an architecture that combines enterprise data retrieval systems with large language models to generate context-aware, grounded responses.
Keywords: Enterprise RAG, retrieval augmented generation, enterprise retrieval, RAG for enterprise

Definition: A Secure AI Copilot is an AI assistant designed with strict access controls, auditability, and data isolation to operate safely in regulated enterprise environments.
Keywords: Secure AI Copilot, secure copilot, AI security, access controls AI

Definition: Data-Sovereign AI describes AI systems that ensure data residency, ownership, and governance remain fully under the control of the data owner.
Keywords: Data-Sovereign AI, data sovereignty, data residency, sovereign AI
